Class util

extends Object
    A class containing utility methods for PaintController

    • Method Detail

      • alertUser

        public static void alertUser(String header,
                             String s,
                             String title,
                             Alert.AlertType alertType)
                      throws AlertException
        Displays a custom dialog to the end user
        Parameters:
        header - The header text of the alert
        s - The String to display
        title - The title of the alert
        alertType - The StageStyle for the dialog
        Throws:
        AlertException - Thrown if the alert doesn't show
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Alert.AlertType

      • infoAlert

        public static void infoAlert(String s,
                             String header)
                      throws AlertException
        Shows an informational alert with message s

        Simpler than alertUser(String, String, String, Alert.AlertType)
        Parameters:
        s - The message to display
        header - The header of the alert (usually a summary)
        Throws:
        AlertException - Thrown if the alert doesn't show

      • errorAlert

        public static void errorAlert(String s,
                              String header)
                       throws AlertException
        Display an error alert with message s
        Parameters:
        s - The message to display
        header - The header of the error (usually a summary)
        Throws:
        AlertException - Thrown if the alert doesn't show

      • getScreenSize

        public static Dimension getScreenSize()
        Gets the current screen size
        Returns:
        Dimension

      • log

        public static void log(String message,
                       util.LogType logtype)
        Writes a message to .jpaint_log with util.LogType logType}. This has no association to java.util.logging
        Parameters:
        message - The message to output.
        logtype - the type of message message is.
        Since:
        1.0.3
